languages.text: "Я только раз в жизни сходилась в бою с огиром. Древние создания, которым должно было остаться в прошлом. Их пробуждение в эти времена... тревожный знак".
"I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."
languages.original_text: "Я только раз в жизни сходилась в бою с огиром. Древние создания, которым должно было остаться в прошлом. Их пробуждение в эти времена... тревожный знак".

traits.locale_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."
"I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."
"I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."
"I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

languages.text: “我曾与一只遗落者交战过，这群古老的生物本该埋葬在过去才对。他们会在这种时候觉醒……这相当令人不安。”
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: “我曾与一只遗落者交战过，这群古老的生物本该埋葬在过去才对。他们会在这种时候觉醒……这相当令人不安。”

languages.text: « J'ai affronté un Oghyr par le passé. Des créatures d'un temps révolu qui auraient mieux fait de rester enterrées. Le fait qu'elles réapparaissent alors que la situation est si critique est pour le moins... troublant. »
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai affronté un Oghyr par le passé. Des créatures d'un temps révolu qui auraient mieux fait de rester enterrées. Le fait qu'elles réapparaissent alors que la situation est si critique est pour le moins... troublant. »

languages.text: «Solo me he enfrentado a un Oghyr en combate una vez. Son seres ancianos que deberían quedar en el pasado. Su despertar en estos tiempos es... más que preocupante».
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: «Solo me he enfrentado a un Oghyr en combate una vez. Son seres ancianos que deberían quedar en el pasado. Su despertar en estos tiempos es... más que preocupante».

languages.text: 「私は一度だけオグハイルと戦ったことがある。古代の生き物で過去に残されるべき存在だった。この時代に彼らが目覚めたのは...厄介な兆候だ」
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: 「私は一度だけオグハイルと戦ったことがある。古代の生き物で過去に残されるべき存在だった。この時代に彼らが目覚めたのは...厄介な兆候だ」

languages.text: "Ich habe einmal gegen einen Oghyr gekämpft. Es sind uralte Kreaturen, die lieber in der Vergangenheit hätten bleiben sollen. Dass sie in diesen Zeiten erwachen, ist ... beunruhigend."
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einmal gegen einen Oghyr gekämpft. Es sind uralte Kreaturen, die lieber in der Vergangenheit hätten bleiben sollen. Dass sie in diesen Zeiten erwachen, ist ... beunruhigend."

languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

languages.text: "Bir Oghyr ile savaşta bir kez karşılaşmıştım. Geçmişte kalmış olması gereken eski yaratıklar. Günümüzde uyanmış olmaları, hiç iyiye alamet değil."
languages.original_text: "I have fought an Oghyr in battle only once. They are ancient creatures that should have been left in the past. Their awakening in these times is... a troubling sign."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Oghyr ile savaşta bir kez karşılaştım. Geçmişte kalmış olması gereken eski yaratıklar. Günümüzde uyanmış olmaları hiç iyiye alamet değil."
